channel.title: How to add D-claws to a non-508
channel.description: well yeah read title just tell me how

item.title: How to add D-claws to a non-508
item.dc:creator: @jbblaze jbblaze
item.description:
@jbblaze wrote:

OK. First you have to find a class8.java that has the correct intâ€™s for dragon claws. Then with a DAT maker, import the int file to MQQ with is open able for some graphics programs. Edit it. Re import threw DAT maker, enable all points and make sure you correctly choose hand. You could copy a different Id int, but since there both handed some DAT makes and runescape java armory supporters (also have to get) may not handle or will be able to script you your double handed weapon. You make have to write a whole new set of variables for the dragon claws. Once scripted add to class8.java, go to models use DAT maker to make .DAT use winzip or winrar to zip it up add to models with requested ID. You will need to use same item id for both the int and the model id. You also have to make a drop model and repeat the steps. The int for d-claws should include a small method for the drop model that will import the drop model number. (also have to add drop model to client.)

Read full topic
